otherNames: Wo Keyi Tunshi Wanwu, I Can Devour Everything, Wǒ Kěyǐ Tūnshì Wànwù, 我可以吞噬万物, The Unrivaled Sweeper: I Can Infinitely Integrate, 盖世扫地僧：我可以无限融合
synopsis: An Jing, a handyman disciple of Tianqing Sect, obtained the fusion system by chance, but he was born with a low-key personality and did not like to show off, so he slowly developed as a handyman disciple, never making any limelight, and embarked on the long road to immortality. He secretly helped the Tianqing Sect solve many big troubles. From then on, the Tianqing Sect had a legend about a mysterious man!
